Title: Relates to establishing a statewide youth mental health advisory board
Summary: Establishes a youth mental health advisory board consisting of youths aged 16-20 to examine and make recommendations for legislation and initiatives regarding issues of youth mental health including social media, bullying, substance use, trauma, poverty and access to services.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to establishing a statewide youth mental health advisory board
